title: Tower execute stats.
body: In the recent article "EXECUTED; The Terrible Truth About Jungle Monsters" we see the stats all about the jungle cam executes throughout seasons. There is a paragraph talking about singed's non-jungler execute rise in Season 7 along with the article which says how 45.18% of executes are to towers. As a singed{{champion:27}}   main, i was wondering is there was a way for us to view specific champ's % of tower executes when compared to other champions in the game. This would enlighten me very much this were possible. I liked that article.

replies.body: Riot would have the ability to look at that stats, but we have no way outside of those riot posts to compile stats like that (as getting the API to show every game that is played is impossible).

the big tower executes will definitely be singed since I think wasting the enemy team's time is kinda of his thing, followed by whatever champions are FoTM in Bronze right now. Watching people towerdive in my elo is painful.
